roleset.name: what circuit breakers do

example.name: passive
example.text: [A circuit breaker that [*T*-1] would have closed down the New York Stock Exchange]-2 was n't tripped [*-2] .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'trip' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: behave as if under the influence of drugs

role.descr: mention of 'balls' or other intensifying object

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: That's right - the guy who came up with the double helix shape you studied in grade school, was tripping on acid.
example.arg: the guy who came up with the double helix shape you studied in grade school,

example.name: all args
example.text: Yeah and he was tripping balls off all that acid.

example.name: alternate arg2-stimulus
example.text: Everyone was tripping about Evelyn being on Iyanla's show
example.arg: about Evelyn being on Iyanla's show
